reviews.text: From 0.33l bottle. Pours dark brown with thin white head. Coffee, caramel, bit sweet. Not bad porter at all.
From bottle, pours red-brown with thin white head with short retention and average lacing. Taste of roasted grain and touch of caramel. Bit bitter end. Average beer.
12oz bottle. Pours hazy yellow, with tick white head, great retention and lacing. Aroma of wheat and citrus. Very smooth and refreshing beer. Medium body. Enjoyed it.
